name: Bob and Jerry
description:
This was a game uploaded for the 2021 GMTK GameJam. 

Play as two slimes, Bob and Jerry, as they traverse and get thrown through a vibrant world.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Q - Switch character
E - Interact, Pick up Bob
Left Click (As Jerry): Throw Bob
Right Click (As Jerry): Call Bob back to Jerry

Credits

Art - Dion Picard

Game and Level Design - Triona

Code - Alec Richardson

Music - Poizone
